title: How to Do a Mohawk | AXE | Instagroom
description:
Becky is a proud mohawker. This is how she keeps it bold. 

THE TOOLS:
AXE Adrenaline Spiked-Up Look Day Long Glue

THE STEPS:
1. Rub glue in hair
2. Blast it back with a hairdryer 
3. Get more glue and shape

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: When I get my hair into a mohawk, I get some glue, rub it around in my hands. Rub it through my hair. Get the hair dryer and then just blast it back. And then I just get a bit of glue to finish the style off. I always feel a bit bolder if I have my hair up in a mohawk.
